name: Cleaner 9gag
description:
Based on "clean 9gag" by rendle, updated for newest 9gag changes.
Best used with Dark9GAG
additional_info:
Please report any bugs or suggestions on discord -  SaDiablo#0637
If there are any problems, first check if reinstalling helps.

Known bugs:
- Missing Hot, Trending and Fresh links on navigating bar (will try to fix it soon)

Changelog:
v2.1.0
- Little fix of a broken update from 9gag 
v2.0.2
- Added possibility to hide youtube posts (temporary solution to autoplay, default visible)
v2.0.1
- Fixed few bugs 
v2.0
- Added possibility to fully turn off section sidebar
v1.2.1
- Small improvements for posts
- Polishing out comment box animation
v1.2
- Corrected notifications
- Deleted links at the top of the page
- Resizeable comment box (Default on)
v1.1
- Added option to hide section sidebar for every resolution
v1.0
- Initial upload

style_setting_options.label: Off
